>
[Ratfolk Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5654) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 30 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 You also gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) general feat for [Ratfolk Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41).
name: Ratfolk Lore
